mapper.select: SELECT IQ.INQUIRY_CODE AS inquiryCode, IQ.INQUIRY_TITLE AS inquiryTitle, IQ.INQUIRY_CONTENT AS inquiryContent, TO_CHAR(IQ.INQUIRY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS inquiryDate , IQ.INQUIRY_ANSWER AS inquiryAnswer, IQ.INQUIRY_ANSWER_DATE AS inquiryAnswerDate, IQ.INQUIRY_STATUS AS inquiryStatus , IQ.USER_CODE AS inquiryUserCode, IQ.USER_ID AS inquiryUserId, U.USER_NAME AS inquiryUserName FROM ITEM_INQUIRIES IQ JOIN USERINFOES U ON IQ.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE ORDER BY IQ.INQUIRY_DATE DESC
